description.value:
This gemstone grants its wearer a +2 item bonus to saving throws.

Each heartstone is powered by the spirit of a specific night hag. If it's separated from her for 24 hours (or she's been dead for 24 hours), it becomes a nonmagical gemstone. A heartstone allows the hag to use additional occult innate spells: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Ethereal Jaunt] (9th level) and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Seize Soul] at will, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Shadow Blast] twice per day.

Activate 1 command

Requirements You must be touching the heartstone.

Effect The heartstone attempts to counteract one disease affecting you (counteract rank 5, counteract modifier [[/r {1d20+18} #Counteract Modifier]]{+18}).

Craft Requirements You must be a night hag.
